p: The EOs from both Egyptian and Saudi ecospecies exhibited significant allelopathic activity ( p < 0.05) against the weed B. pilosa ( Figure 3, Table S1). The germination of B. pilosa was reduced by 91.7% and 75.0% when treated with 100 µL L −1 of the EO from Egyptian and Saudi ecospecies of C. procera, respectively ( Figure 3a).
